name: Minecraft Sweeper
body:
### Authors and Contributors
My name is [Karolis](http://karolis.misiunas.com). I have created the game after getting my first Android phone. The current version owns to many people and wish to acknowledge their contributions: 
* [Tautvydas Misiunas](https://www.linkedin.com/in/misiunas) developed the online score system for v2 and constanly gave his feedback. 
* JelleWho made countless suggestions for the v3.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
